titleStmt.title: A warning to the inhabitants of the whole earth and perticulerly, or more especially, to the inhabitants of England, Scotland, and Ireland, and the islands and places to the same belonging and adjoyning, as appearing to be now under the more present and imediate concerne hereof, and to the rest in their order and time / R.R.
titleStmt.author: R. R. (Richard Robinson), b. 1628?
